shrilankawe ingrisi bhasha kathanaya thawaduratath prachalitha kirime aramunen mulika ingrisi sahathika pathra wibhagayak pawathwimata rajaya thiranaya kara thibe.deshiya ingrisi bhasha puhunukaruwan wisin sakasana lada wishayaya malawakata anuwa pawathwana mulika ingrisi sahathika pathra patamalawa awasanaye di me prasiddha wibhagaya pawathwimata niyamithaya.wibhaga komasaris jenaral anura edirisinha mahatha me wibhagaya pawathwima sambandhawa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha wetha eeye (19) danum dunneya.ee ingrisi ha thorathuru thakshana pilibanda janadhipathi karya sadhaka balakaya wisin kriyawata nanwana lada “jiwana kusalathawak lesa ingrisi” wadasatahane dewani adiyara arambaima wenuwen araliyagaha mandirayedi pawathi uthsawayakadiya.wishesha shasthriya kandayamak wisin sakasana lada paya siyayaka mulika ingrisi patamala sangrahaye palamu pitapathada mehidi janadhipathiwaraya wetha piliganwini.jiwana kusalathawak lesa ingrisi wadasatahane dewani adiyara lesa meya kriyathmaka athara pasal hara yannan, rajaye sewakayan, guruwarun, sewa niyukthikayan, rakiya apekshakayan ha ingrisi kathanaya pilibanda awadhanaya yomu karannan memangin ilakka kere.
